data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Quicke, Donald L. J., Butcher, Buntika A. (2018): First record of Odontosphaeropyx Cameron, 1910 from the Oriental Region with description of a new species from Thailand (Hymenoptera, Braconidae, Cheloninae). ZooKeys 809: 41-47, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.809.30742, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.809.30742
